name: Refrigerator Indesit ITS 5180 W White
origAbout: With button integration Push & Go the refrigerators are intended to improve the preservation of food. In these refrigerators it is easier to keep food in an optimal way, that it is ordered correctly and at the right temperature. With the new function Indesit ensures that food is kept in perfect condition even at times when the door is opened or hot products are added and that logically they raise the temperature inside the refrigerator. With the new function, the refrigerator activates a extra cold that lowers the cavity temperature, restoring it up to 40% faster and creating optimal storage conditions.
